## composedParent() function

Retrieves the "parent" element of a node, ignoring DOM tree boundries. When the "parent" of a node is a shadow-root, it will return the host element of the shadow root.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function composedParent<T extends HTMLElement>(element: T): HTMLElement | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | T | The element to retrieve the parent element of |

<b>Returns:</b>

HTMLElement \| null
